description:
The Osafune Girls` Academy is one of the schools affiliated with the http://anidb.net/ch95156 [Five Traditions], located in Okayama prefecture. The school responds to http://anidb.net/t7100 [aradama] incidents in the Chugoku region, Kyushu and Okinawa. Within Osafune`s jurisdiction is the organization on developing the latest technology, making it active in assisting other schools through the use and testing of experimental equipment.
The school is led by Academy President http://anidb.net/ch94798 [Maniwa Sana].
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Osafune Jogakuen
